text: Alfred Lif (26 March 1908 â€“ 16 May 1980) was a Swedish cross-country skier. In 1935, he won the Swedish 50 kilometers national championship. In 1939, he won the and Vasaloppet competition. He also competed in alpine skiing. He participated in the Swedish alpine skiing national championships of 1937. == References == Category:Swedish skiers Category:1908 births Category:1980 deaths
title: Alfred Lif
